advice: I would ask that the buyers have practical on the floor experience, so they know what the normal woman is looking for in fashion. Many times some of the new arrivals you knew were destined to be sell offs at discount, because of the personal taste of the buyer.This applies to all women's fashion outlets not just Cleo, as you will notice that you see the same or very much the same designs/color stories on many of the competitors racks. Looks like they are buying at the same place to fill their stores. Now you are only one upping by price, not creating the individual look most women want when shopping for clothing and accessories.
